data.title: Kay Kay Menon to play lead in sports drama titled Love All
meta_keywords: kay kay menon love all poster
data.meta_description: Mahesh Bhatt has joined hands with Pullela Gopichand and Anand Pandit for the upcoming sports drama.
data.text:
Mahesh Bhatt has joined hands with Pullela Gopichand and Anand Pandit for the upcoming sports drama.

Image Source : IMDb

Pullela Gopichand is a former Indian badminton player and currently, he is the Chief National Coach for the national team.

Image Source : Twitter

Looking at the poster, it is clear that the sports drama will revolve around badminton sport.

Image Source : Instagram

Love All will also feature Shriswara and Swastika Mukherjee in important roles.

Image Source : IMDb

The film will hit the theaters on August 25, 2023.

Image Source : IMDb

It will be released in Hindi, Malayalam, Kannada, English, Tamil and Telugu.

Image Source : IMDb

Kay Kay Menon was recently seen in crime thriller series Farzi, also starring Shahid Kapoor.

Image Source : IMDb
